metadata.title: CVE-2012-3425 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The png_push_read_zTXt function in pngpread.c in libpng 1.0.x before1.0.58, 1.2.x before 1.2.48, 1.4.x before 1.4.10, and 1.5.x before 1.5.10allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read)via a large avail_in field value in a PNG image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3425` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpng12-0 - 1.2.49-1ubuntu1
libpng3 - 1.2.49-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libpng package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.49-1ubuntu1').
